context: What can you tell me about B.M. Mooyaart-Doubleday?

resp: B.M. Mooyaart-Doubleday is who translated it to English. The true name of the book is Het Achterhuis: Dagboekbrieven 14 juni 1942 - 1 augustus 1944. Have you read the translated version ?
